item.title: Go Tech Lunch Dates 2024
item.description: Go Tech Lunch üçú In addition to our regular meetups, we are trying something else and lightweight: meeting over lunch twice a month. The next dates in 2024 are: August 14, 2024 August 28, 2024 September 11, 2024 September 25, 2024 October 9, 2024 October 23, 2024 November 6, 2024 November 20, 2024 December 4, 2024 December 18, 2024 We always meet 12:15 CET at Pholosophy, (map, google maps).

item.title: Go at Spartakiade 2019 Berlin
item.description: Spartakiade is a regular, developer-centric conference in Berlin. This year it will host over twenty full day workshops, with topics ranging from data science, 3D, docker, kubernetes, and also a few programming language introductions, among them F#, Python, Purescript – and Go! There will be two Go workshops (in English or German, depending on the audience): Apr, 27 2019, 10-17: Kann weniger mehr sein? Eine praktische Einf√ºhrung in die Programmiersprache Go (Can less be more?
